interpretation: The "light rail" emoji depicts a mode of transportation that is fast and efficient. This card represents progress, movement, and change that is swift and smooth. It may indicate a journey or a transition that will be easy and straightforward, with minimal obstacles or delays. However, it can also suggest a need to be flexible and adaptable, as plans may need to shift quickly. This card encourages you to trust in the process and have faith that you will reach your destination on time. Overall, the "light rail" card signifies momentum, momentum, and progress.
